title: Natural Language Voice Commands - Simplified Command Structures for Ease of Use
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to use simple voice commands to manage my daily tasks so that I can maintain my independence without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Social Connection Reminders
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to remind me of social interactions and events based on my preferences so that I can stay connected with family and friends and reduce feelings of isolation.

summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to receive voice-activated medication reminders so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence at home.

summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to adapt to my voice and preferences so that I can interact with it more easily and feel more confident in using technology.

title: Emergency Response Activation – Voice-Triggered Alerts for Emergency Contacts
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to activate emergency alerts using my voice so that I can quickly get help when I need it without having to navigate complex technology.
